  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    UpnpHeader.Type
    Maps a standardized UPnP header to potential header subtypes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidHeaderException
    Thrown if the value of a header was invalid for the given header.
